❌ MISSING: X-Frame-Options
   ℹ️ 🖼️ Protects against clickjacking by preventing the page from being embedded in a frame.
❌ MISSING: X-Content-Type-Options
   ℹ️ 📦 Stops MIME-sniffing attacks by forcing the browser to respect the declared content-type.
❌ MISSING: Referrer-Policy
   ℹ️ 📤 Controls how much referrer information is sent with requests.
❌ MISSING: Permissions-Policy
   ℹ️ 🎛️ Controls which browser features can be used on the page, like the camera or microphone.
❌ MISSING: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
   ℹ️ 🌐 Defines the CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) policy, determining which domains are allowed to access the resource.
